Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hodgkin lymphoma ( HL ) is a relatively chemosensitive malignancy .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| chemosensitive |

Note: "Chemosensitive" is a term used to describe a type of cancer that responds well to chemotherapy drugs. It is considered a "chemical" entity because it refers to the interaction between the cancer cells and the chemical substances (chemotherapy drugs) used to treat the disease.
